item.title: Deploy a K3s cluster with Terraform
item.description: Since Infrastructure-as-Code is all the rage out there (and for good reason, you’re a fool if your entire tech stack is not 100% rebuildable and reproducible in an idempotent way!), I’ve always wondered if I should write and open-source a project that’s written entirely as a Terraform module only and that would spin up a Kubernetes cluster on Swisscom’s public Infrastructure-as-a-Service offering, DCS+ (Dynamic Computing Services), which is based on VMware vCloud Director.
